name: Figrin D'an
Lore: 'A male Bith. Musician who leads the Mos Eisley Cantina band, Figrin D''an and the Modal Nodes. Expert gambler and card shark.',
Text: 'Once each turn during your control phase, you may use 1 Force to make a ''wager.'' Draw three destiny. Opponent draws two destiny. Player with highest total may randomly select one card to be retrieved from that player''s Lost Pile.',
